name: CodelyTV Theme
description:
CodelyTV Theme.

    A modern, good-looking, productivity-increaser theme for all JetBrains IDEs
notes:
• 2.1.1 Fix Codely Dark theme
  • 2.1.0 Add blue theme
  • 2.0.3 Add support for Scala and Go
  • 2.0.2 Add correct theme name to Codely Light
  • 2.0.1 Add light (in beta mode) and normal theme
  • 2.0.0 More Punk to the theme + deprecate older versions. You need to select again the theme with this update
